question: Who is the author of the book '150 Years of Celebrating the Mahatma the South African Legacy'?
explanation: The book titled \'150 Years of Celebrating the Mahatma the South African Legacy\' has been penned by author and journalist Fakir Hassen. It is a 160-page coffee table that records how commemorations of Gandhi\'s activities (including his birth and death anniversaries) were confined to the local Indian community only.
